titleStmt.title: An act by his royal Highness, his Majesties High Commissioner, and Lords of Privy Council, establishing the order of the ryding, &c. at the opening of the ensuing Parliament ... appointed to be recorded in the books of Privy Council ... at Edinburgh, July 25, 1681.
